EmailTemplate.subject: Our sale just got bigger
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thousands of Honeywell surplus parts are massively discounted and available to purchase through Honeywell Aerospace Trading. For your convenience, you can download the available parts list WITH PRICING by clicking here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/SAVEBIG_PROMO_2020-10-23.xlsx]]>.
Checkout directly from our GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> marketplace and receive an additional 50% off your purchase at checkout when you use the promo code SAVEBIG. SHOP NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/discount.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_amer_atr_hat]]> Stay safe, stay healthy and take care,
Timi Reed-Jeske Sales Leader Honeywell Aerospace Trading
